front.title: An Automated Synchronization Mechanism for Configuration Data of DNS (Domain Name System) Name Servers

abstract.t: This document proposes an in-band synchronization mechanism toautomatically synchronize configuration data among multiple DNS(Domain Name System) name servers. Using this mechanism, any part ofconfiguration data of a name server can be constructed as a similarDNS zone file, and be automatically synchronized by DNS messaging andnotifying mechanisms.
